name: PIPE-FLO Project File
summary: Learn about .PIPE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PIPE-FLO projects are used for designing and planning piping systems before constructing them. Projects can be simulated in the software to preview the performance under expected conditions.
NOTE: PIPE files are created by the Professional, Compressible, and Stock versions of PIPE-FLO, as well as Flow of Fluids Premium.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
